participant_1.background:
I like watching shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life.
i love the chainsmokers.
my favorite movie is django unchained.
I've kept my deployment from my parents.
i love to read fantasy novels and poetry.

participant_2.background:
I am from a small town where the beach is my favorite place to relax and read.
I loved to play make believe in the woods behind my house.
i have a cheap car my dad gave me.
i enjoy watching horror flicks.
I love having my laptop with me wherever I go.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do for fun?
I really like to relax and read by the beach, especially when I'm home in my small town.
Oh that sounds nice! I love to read too, but I usually prefer to read fantasy novels or poetry.
I've never been a big fan of fantasy, but I do enjoy reading poetry sometimes.
What is your favorite kind of poetry?
I like to read a lot of different kinds, but I think my favorite is probably sonnets.
I've never read a sonnet before! I'll have to check some out.
What do you like to do for fun besides read?
I love to watch horror movies. I have a huge collection of them on my laptop.
Oh cool! I don't really watch horror movies, but I know they're really popular.
Yeah, they're definitely not for everyone, but I love the suspense and scares.
I guess I could see how that would be fun.
No, I don't have any pets right now. I would love to have a dog, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for the responsibility yet.
I have a dog! He's a little terrier mix named Toby. He's the best dog ever.
Oh that sounds cute! I've always liked terriers.
